metadata.title: Russian Delayed Mode Data Base (DMDB) of POI for NEAR-GOOS

creators.name: Pacific Oceanological Institute (POI), Russian Academy of Sciences Far Eastern Branch

metadata.description: Provides a suite of oceanographic data observed and collected by the Pacific Oceanological Institute (POI, Vladivostok, Russia) on the NEAR-GOOS area since 1995.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To offer basic data service to NEAR-GOOS and GOOS communities as part of the NEAR-GOOS project.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system.
